task.summary: Added transaction support for DB methods. Some pages are not using Bootstrap. Optimized search algorithm.
For best using database changed from Derby to MySQL. Rewriting tables of DB and methods for working with DB. Almost all methods coverage a Unit Test by JUnit4.
Add documentation. Add edit profile. All forms transferred to the post requests.
